titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the discovery of rebells invading the county of Glocester, and for the apprehending of spies and intelligencers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: With royal coat of arms at head of document.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford this fourteenth of January, in the nineteenth year of Our Reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
